WorkItem.Description:
Both "WGS 84 / UPS North" (SRID 32661) and "WGS 84 / UPS South" (SRID 32761) use Polar_Stereographic projection which is not supported.
 
GeoTools project (LGPL/Java) has an implementation that could help as reference. 
 
________________________________________
Odegaard comment::
Just a note: This will require heavy clipping of geometries to the horizon of the projection for any non-point geometry (Something none of the current projections do).
